tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_levels (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    current_stock INT,
    optimal_stock INT
);

CREATE TABLE sustainable_food_products (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_category VARCHAR(100),
    quantity INT,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_levels (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    current_quantity INT,
    min_quantity_threshold INT,
    max_quantity_threshold INT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    product_category TEXT NOT NULL,
    unit_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    stock_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW()
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    contact_person TEXT,
    email TEXT NOT NULL,
    phone_number TEXT,
    location TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    order_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    order_date DATE NOT NULL,
    delivery_date DATE,
    status TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    current_stock_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    min_stock_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    max_stock_quantity INT NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE FoodProducts (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    last_restock_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_inventory_product FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES FoodProducts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE RestockOrders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    quantity_ordered INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_restock_product FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES FoodProducts(id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_restock_supplier FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(10),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_transaction_product FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES FoodProducts(id)
);
